segments.text: Good morning , sir . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning ! Do you have any rooms available at the moment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . What kind of room would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a suite for four nights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please wait a moment while I check availability . Ah , I'm sorry , sir . We only have a double room available now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . How much do they cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Each night costs 320 RIB , but for a four night stay , we can offer a discount of 15 % .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much in total ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is breakfast included ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . You also have free use of the leisure facilities here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . I'll get it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please fill out this form with your details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to pay by cash . Do I need to pay a deposit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you do . There is a 300 RIB deposit , which we will refund when you check out . So , in total , you need to pay 1388 RIB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Here's your key and receipt . Your room number is 408 . A porter will take your luggage to your room . The elevator is just around the corner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is my pleasure , sir . I wish you a pleasant stay here . Goodbye !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bye-bye !
segments.speaker: S2
